languages.text: "Хах, так вот, что отвлекло ксеносов... Ваше появление во дворце. Мне удалось вырваться из их хватки только потому, что проклятые друкари внезапно все бросили и решили бежать". {n}Янтарные глаза Ахиллеаса злобно сверкают, когда он кивает на трупы под ногами.{/n} "Впрочем, поворачиваться ко мне спиной было ошибкой".

traits.locale_text: "Хах, так вот, что отвлекло ксеносов... Ваше появление во дворце. Мне удалось вырваться из их хватки только потому, что проклятые друкари внезапно все бросили и решили бежать". {n}Янтарные глаза Ахиллеаса злобно сверкают, когда он кивает на трупы под ногами.{/n} "Впрочем, поворачиваться ко мне спиной было ошибкой".

languages.text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."
languages.original_text: "Хах, так вот, что отвлекло ксеносов... Ваше появление во дворце. Мне удалось вырваться из их хватки только потому, что проклятые друкари внезапно все бросили и решили бежать". {n}Янтарные глаза Ахиллеаса злобно сверкают, когда он кивает на трупы под ногами.{/n} "Впрочем, поворачиваться ко мне спиной было ошибкой".

I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes flare spitefully as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their back to me."

I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes flare spitefully as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their back to me."

"Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

languages.text: 「ふっ、なるほど…陛下が宮殿に戻ってきたために、異種族は動揺したのですね。ヴォイドに呪われしデュカーリが突然動きを止めて逃げ出したおかげで、私はかろうじて助かったのです」{n}足元に転がる死体を見ると、アキレアスの琥珀色の瞳がギラギラと輝いた。{/n}「私に背を向けるとは、奴らも愚かなものだ」
languages.original_text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

traits.locale_text: 「ふっ、なるほど…陛下が宮殿に戻ってきたために、異種族は動揺したのですね。ヴォイドに呪われしデュカーリが突然動きを止めて逃げ出したおかげで、私はかろうじて助かったのです」{n}足元に転がる死体を見ると、アキレアスの琥珀色の瞳がギラギラと輝いた。{/n}「私に背を向けるとは、奴らも愚かなものだ」

languages.text: “哈，怪不得那群异形阵脚大乱……原来是因为您出现在了宫殿里。幸亏那群该死的黑暗灵族拔腿就跑，我才有机会从他们的魔爪中脱身。”{n}阿吉里亚斯朝脚下的尸体看了一眼，琥珀色的瞳孔中露出一抹凶光。{/n}“他们打算背对着我逃跑，那是个致命的错误。”
languages.original_text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

traits.locale_text: “哈，怪不得那群异形阵脚大乱……原来是因为您出现在了宫殿里。幸亏那群该死的黑暗灵族拔腿就跑，我才有机会从他们的魔爪中脱身。”{n}阿吉里亚斯朝脚下的尸体看了一眼，琥珀色的瞳孔中露出一抹凶光。{/n}“他们打算背对着我逃跑，那是个致命的错误。”

languages.text: «Ja. Conque eso es lo que ha distraído a los xenos... su llegada a palacio. Solo he podido zafarme de sus garras porque los malditos Drukhari han dejado lo que estaban haciendo para escapar». {n}Los ojos ambarinos de Achilleas tienen un brillo brutal cuando asiente en dirección a los cadáveres que hay a sus pies.{/n} «Han cometido un error al darme la espalda».
languages.original_text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

traits.locale_text: «Ja. Conque eso es lo que ha distraído a los xenos... su llegada a palacio. Solo he podido zafarme de sus garras porque los malditos Drukhari han dejado lo que estaban haciendo para escapar». {n}Los ojos ambarinos de Achilleas tienen un brillo brutal cuando asiente en dirección a los cadáveres que hay a sus pies.{/n} «Han cometido un error al darme la espalda».

languages.text: « Ah, c'est donc ça qui a détourné l'attention des xénos... Votre arrivée dans le palais. J'étais en fâcheuse posture, mais ces vermines de Drukharis ont soudainement cessé de s'en prendre à moi et ont filé sans demander leur reste. » {n}Achilleas désigne du menton les cadavres étendus à ses pieds, un éclat mauvais dans ses yeux ambrés.{/n} « Ils n'auraient pas dû me tourner le dos. »
languages.original_text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, c'est donc ça qui a détourné l'attention des xénos... Votre arrivée dans le palais. J'étais en fâcheuse posture, mais ces vermines de Drukharis ont soudainement cessé de s'en prendre à moi et ont filé sans demander leur reste. » {n}Achilleas désigne du menton les cadavres étendus à ses pieds, un éclat mauvais dans ses yeux ambrés.{/n} « Ils n'auraient pas dû me tourner le dos. »

languages.text: "Ah, das hat also die Xenos abgelenkt ... Euer Erscheinen im Palast. Ich konnte mich nur aus ihren Klauen befreien, weil die leerenverdammten Drukhari plötzlich alles liegen und stehen ließen und davonrannten." {n}Achilleas' Augen glitzern wütend, als er in Richtung der Leichen zu seinen Füßen nickt.{/n} "Es war ein Fehler von ihnen, mir den Rücken zuzukehren."
languages.original_text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, das hat also die Xenos abgelenkt ... Euer Erscheinen im Palast. Ich konnte mich nur aus ihren Klauen befreien, weil die leerenverdammten Drukhari plötzlich alles liegen und stehen ließen und davonrannten." {n}Achilleas' Augen glitzern wütend, als er in Richtung der Leichen zu seinen Füßen nickt.{/n} "Es war ein Fehler von ihnen, mir den Rücken zuzukehren."

languages.text: "Zenoların dikkatini dağıtan buymuş demek... Sizin saraya gelişiniz. Boşluk alasıca Drukhari köpekleri birden ellerindeki işi bırakıp dönünce ancak kurtulabildim." {n}Achilleas'ın kehribar rengi gözleri, ayağının altındaki cesetlere bakarken kinle parlıyor.{/n} "Geri dönmeleri hiç faydalarına olmadı."
languages.original_text: "Hah, so that's what distracted the xenos... your appearance at the palace. I was only able to break free from their clutches because the void-damned Drukhari suddenly dropped what they were doing and ran off." {n}Achilleas's amber eyes glitter viciously as he nods at the corpses at his feet.{/n} "It was a mistake on their part to turn their backs to me."

traits.locale_text: "Zenoların dikkatini dağıtan buymuş demek... Sizin saraya gelişiniz. Boşluk alasıca Drukhari köpekleri birden ellerindeki işi bırakıp dönünce ancak kurtulabildim." {n}Achilleas'ın kehribar rengi gözleri, ayağının altındaki cesetlere bakarken kinle parlıyor.{/n} "Geri dönmeleri hiç faydalarına olmadı."
